queue.tooManyQueueItems: Exceeding the maximum item count of queue.
queue.fallbackNotice:
This song couldn't be played in the normal method, so used an alternative method. If this behavior is obviously an error, please contact our support.
It may be NOT played correctly, like it takes more time than usual or it ends suddenly. We don't support such cases. When you have any troubles, use command `reset` to reset all data in the server.
queue.spotifyNotice: Songs on Spotify may NOT be played correctly.
queue.noDescriptionInPlaylist: プレイリストから指定のため詳細は表示されません。

search.resultFooterInteraction: 再生したい項目を、下から選択してください。キャンセルするには、下から"キャンセル"を選択してください。また、サムネイルコマンドを使用してサムネイルを確認することもできます。
search.resultFooterMessage: Choose item(s) you want to play and send number(s) or select on the pull down. If you cancel, select/send "キャンセル" or "cancel". You can also check the thumbnail(s) by using command "thumbnail".
search.typeOrSelect: Type and send numbers or select here...
search.maximumSearch: すでに開いている検索パネルが上限を超えています。

play.waitingForLiveCanceled: 待機をキャンセルしました

skip.howToUseSkipVote: If you approve skipping `{{title}}`, press the button below.
skip.skipVoteDescription: If most of the members approved, this song would be skipped.
skip.skipRequirement_one: {{count}} more approval is needed to skip this song.
skip.skipRequirement_other: {{count}} more approvals are needed to skip this song.
